pages.title: Beehive Oven Pit
pages.text: Some blocks are only able to be cooked over long periods of time. This is done using a beehive oven. $(br2)Currently converts:   $(li)Subbituminous Coal --> Bituminous Coal   $(li)Bituminous coal --> Coke   $(li)Limestone --> Quicklime   $(li)Magnesite --> Magnesia   $(li)Pig Iron --> Bloom Iron
Uses random ticks to cook blocks. Making multiple is recomended.

Right click the pit block with flint and steelto activate. It will cook the blocks on the outer ring two blocks high (16 blocks total). The pit deactivates when no cookable blocks are detected. Blaze powder can be used on the pit to instantly cook one block.
1.5x speed. Upgrade the surrounding bricks to magnesium refractory bricks.
2.0x speed. Upgrade the surrounding bricks to zircon refractory bricks.
